items.title: AT&T is raising home internet prices for the second year in a row
items.summary: Everything seems to be getting back-to-back price hikes right now, why not your home internet bill too? AT&T is raising prices by $5 a month on all AT&T Internet plans, the company confirms to The Verge. Thatâ€™s on top of its $5-a-month increase from November 2024, and, it appears, a $5-a-month incrâ€¦
